hero.heroTagline: I'm a creative graphic designer and also a Professor.

sectionOne.is1Text: Since beginning my journey as a freelance designer nearly 8 years ago, I've done remote work for agencies, consulted for startups, and collaborated with talented people to create digital products for both business and consumer use. I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.
sectionOne.secondTagline: I'm passionate about graphics, programming, and photography.

testimonial.testi: One of the great web development Freelacer in India I have ever worked with. My Wordpress based website developed exactly as what I wanted. With an eye for detail & a great understanding of Wordpress

footer.quote: Live, Learn, Love & Level Up Everyday
